# Language analysis

## Countries per catalog

```{r countries, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
for (catal in names(catalogs)) {
  print(catal)
  tab <- table(catalogs[[catal]]$publication_country)
  print(tab[tab > 0])
  print("----------")
}
```


## Top places

```{r top_place, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ntop <- 20
p <- top_plot(subdat[[field]], ntop = ntop) +
       labs(title = paste(catalog, field)) +
       scale_x_log10() +
       theme_comhis("discrete")
print(p)
```
